No, I've no idea but perhaps one of the Chicago guys would know. I seem to =
recall that Saul Ploplys wife was in that group...but it has been a few yea=
rs ago. Milt, do you know??

Ron

  Andres -

  A number of ye=
ars back a group of women from the Chicago area put on an
  absolutely awes=
ome demonstration of naginata usage, the first (and last)
  I've ever exper=
ienced. It would be an interesting demonstration to again
  present at one =
of our sword shows particularly for us non-martial arts guys
  and gals.

 =
 Ron
  STL

  Mark,

  Thanks for the info on Kendo World and the =
Naginata book. I'll look
  into it. I am a "practitioner"-, although the we=
apon I mostly train
  with is the katana. Nonetheless, I started training w=
ith naginata,
  too, about, oh, 3 years ago. I'm still a rank beginner, but=
 I'm very
  much interested in it as a weapon. I also started training in Y=
ari
  around the same time. But while I practice and learn katana waza
  we=
ekly, or sometimes more often, I do naginata and yari maybe once a month.

=
  Best Regards,

  Andres

  At 07:54 AM 12/8/2006, you wrote:
  >Hi Andres=
,

olearms. Knutsen's book is one of the only ones in english that
  I

ware of. Are you a "practitioner" of Naginata or simply looking to
  study
=

ive Guide by
  >Dr. Alexander Bennett. It is only available through;

ERLINK " HYPERLINK

m"www.kendo-world.-com
  A warning
  >though; the suppliers have a "reputat=
ion" for being slow with their orders.
  >I placed an order 2 weeks ago and=
 there hasn't been any movement on my
  >credit card or even an e-mail conf=
irmation of my request. Expect a wait of
  >3-4 months! With that said, the=
 book comes with some glowing reviews since
  >anything on the subject in e=
nglish is so rare. During the historical
  >developement of Japan, it's ama=
zing to see that the Katana took a backseat

d Roald and

pressed and sorry I did not purchase it earlier. The

tive text plus the wealth of drawings and plates

e.

  >If there's anyone else out there interested in the subject and th=
at

mas. You won't regret it.

lists (or someone who knows

om me... This book will

ommend? I'm thirsty for more knowledge now.
